entry.title: Monday: Chance of showers. High 8. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of showers late this afternoon. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50. High 8. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Monday 13 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Flurries or rain showers. Low minus 8.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of rain showers early this evening. Flurries beginning this evening. Local snowfall amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Monday 13 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 3. POP 30%
entry.summary: Flurries ending in the morning then a mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 14 in the morning and minus 7 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Monday 13 February 2023
